Applications of Manual Plant

The following are some of the processes that this plant can perform:

  • Zinc plating – auto parts, drawer rails, bicycle parts, and so on.
  • Nickel Chrome Plating: Building Hardware, Bathroom Fittings, Bicycle Components, Textile Machine Components, and Other Nickel Chrome Plating
  • ABS Plating: Nickel+Chrome plating of small components such as perfume bottle tops and Auto-Components.

Why choose us?

  • Low Maintenance and Easy to Operate
  • Load and Unload on the Same Side
  • Longer Service Life
  • Lower Capital Cost than Manual Line
  • Ability to use at Lower Ceiling Height in Factories.
  • Less Expensive than Automated Lines

Functioning Of Manual Plant

All components are simultaneously plated and transferred. Except for long components that travel immersed within the tank, the plant has an indexed fixed cycle time. With the help of a copper strip on the tanks and a copper current collector on each work-arm, DC current is passed in the electrolytic process.

Why Automation is Preferred in Plating?

In bulk plating operations, automation is strongly recommended for the following reasons:

  • Consistency
  • Lower Labor costs
  • Eradication of Human errors
  • Reduced Operating costs
  • Controlled Inputs
  • Better Production Control
  • Traceability and Versatility

How Automation in Plating Works at US Automation?

  • Requirement based Loading
  • Process Driven Auto Controlled Current and Temperature
  • Automatic conductivity and level control
  • Auto-dosing based on ampere-hour consumption/processed area
  • Production and Data Recording for Events and Alarms
  • Process Monitoring through the Internet
  • SMS/Email notification of an event
  • Voice Activation
  • Parts identification with a bar scanner

US Automation develops, designs, manufactures, and distributes high-tech Mechanized Return Type plating machines for a variety of applications.

A mechanized return type plating factory is capable of plating a large number of similar-finish components.

Plants of this type often provide a medium to high amount of production.
